title: Elegant Polki and Ruby Necklace - A Statement of Timeless Grace
features: Floral motif Polki setting with intricately designed petals. Features a central pendant with a large, bezel-set oval-cut ruby, surrounded by Polki diamonds. The design seamlessly blends traditional Polki setting techniques with a modern aesthetic.
occasions: Suitable for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaah)
and milestone celebrations. Also perfect for adding a touch of regal elegance to contemporary events.
description: This Polki Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. The high-quality Polki diamonds exhibit exceptional brilliance, while the deep red ruby symbolizes love and passion. Its versatile design makes it a cherished heirloom to be passed down through generations.
